name: Hunted v1.0.1
description:
What is Hunted?

Hunted is a Singleplayer voxel survival game. Where you try to survive in a big world. You gather items like food, tools and weapons. You build your own shelter to survive the nights.

Ingame Features

Every thing you do in the world will be saved and you will earn some nice achievments for it.

Hunted offers 2 big worlds where you can survive and you can show you can handle it at your own.

Hunted is having 3rd world without items in this world. For Android & iOS players this can be used to try out the mobile version of Hunted.

Important

Please keep in mind that this game is still under development and can contain bugs or glitches. The game will also stay recieving updates.

For questions or game bugs please email to:
gaming4all.play@gmail.com


Community

Read the community forums on this page for info about updates and share your thoughs about the game!
